-- | Library and command line tool for converting XML files to json
--   
@package xml-to-json
@version 2.0.1

module Text.XML.JSON.XmlToJson
xmlToJson :: [Flag] -> [String] -> IO ()
data Flag
Input :: String -> Flag
StartFrom :: String -> Flag
Multiline :: Flag
SkipRoots :: Flag
NoIgnoreNulls :: Flag
WrapArray :: Flag
NoCollapseText :: String -> Flag
ShowHelp :: Flag
instance Show Flag
instance Eq Flag
instance Eq JSValueName
instance Ord JSValueName
instance Show JSValueName
